basic:
Plus one

Adds one to the selected number

Minus one

Subtracts one from the selected number

Times five

Multiplies the selected number by five

Times ten

Multiplies the selected number by ten

Times one hundred

Multiplies the selected number by one hundred

Divided by five

Divides the selected number by five

Divided by ten

Divides the selected number by ten

Divided by one hundred

Divides the selected number by one hundred
common:
Plus

Adds a given input to the selected number

Minus

Subtracts a given input from the selected number

Times

Multiplies the selected number by a given input

Divided by

Divides the selected number by a given input

Negate

Flips the sign of the selected number

Square root

Takes the square root of the selected number
uncommon:
Power

Raises the selected number to a given input power

Absolute value

Takes the absolute value of the selected number

Root

Takes the n-root of a selected number where n is a given input

Append

Sticks a given input to the end of a selected number string-wise

Prepend

Sticks a given input to the front of a selected number string-wise

Digit sum

Takes the sum of all digits of the selected number

Digit product

Takes the product of all digits of the selected number

Randomize

Randomizes the selected number into a new one

Digit count

Takes the digit length of the selected number string-wise

Sort ascending

Sorts the selected number in ascending order of digits

Sort descending

Sorts the selected number in descending order of digits
rare:
Reverse

Reverses the digits of the selected number

Drop last digit

Removes the last digit from the selected number

Drop first digit

Removes the first digit from the selected number

Prime jump

Jumps to the prime number that is nearest to the selected number

Square jump

Jumps to the perfect square that is nearest to the selected number

Modulo

Calculates the modulo of the selected number with respect to a given input

Multiple jump

Jumps to the multiple of a given input that is nearest to the selected number

Palindrome

Forms a palindrome by sticking the reverse of the selected number to its end

Greatest common divisor

Finds the greatest common divisor of the selected number and a given input

Least common multiple

Finds the least common multiple of the selected number and a given input
epic:
Factorial

Takes the factorial of the selected number

Fibonacci jump

Jumps to the Fibonacci number that is nearest to the selected number

Copy

Copies a given input to the selected number's slot

Double factorial

Takes the double factorial of the selected number

Divisor sum

Takes the sum of all the divisors of the selected number
legendary:
Halve distance

Halves the distance between the selected number and the goal number

Percentage

Takes the percentage of the selected number over the goal number

Orbit

Orbits the selected number around the goal number
